content: My name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for a one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [answered] I did not reach a final price with the landlord, Peter Schmidt. The highest price I offered was 400 Euros, but he believed it was still not enough for his apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [answered] I did not provide a satisfaction level with the outcome, as the conversation did not reach a final agreed price.
name: Farhad Abbasi
